solution_line_template: If Oprah wants to have {target_cars} cars left, she will have to give away {initial_cars}-{target_cars} = <<{initial_cars}-{target_cars}={cars_to_give_away}>>{cars_to_give_away} cars.

Since the average number of cars she gives away per year is {cars_per_year}, it will take her {cars_to_give_away}/{cars_per_year} = <<{cars_to_give_away}/{cars_per_year}={years_needed}>>{years_needed} years to give away enough cars to have {target_cars} left over.
